name: Alex Carter
persona: Alex Carter is a 20-year-old Computer Science major who is currently struggling academically, with a very low CGPA. Alex finds it challenging to stay organized and motivated, often putting in minimal effort toward coursework and study. While test anxiety is not a significant barrier, Alex lacks perseverance and self-discipline, leading to inconsistent academic performance. Despite these challenges, Alex is aware of the need for improvement and is considering seeking support to get back on track.
